title: Low Grade Alert
message: Student STU009 has received grades below 60% in Mathematics. Academic intervention recommended.

title: Excessive Absences
message: Student STU001 has missed 4 consecutive days in English Literature. Parent contact required.

message: Student STU015 has been causing disruptions in Biology class. Counselor meeting scheduled.

title: Medical Condition Alert
message: Student STU005 requires insulin administration monitoring. Diabetes management plan activated.

title: Assignment Submission Deadline
message: Poetry Analysis assignments are due tomorrow for English Literature I - Section A.

message: Parent-teacher conferences scheduled for November 15-16. Sign-up sheets available in main office.

title: Excellent Performance
message: Student STU002 has achieved outstanding grades across all subjects. Recognition ceremony invitation sent.

title: Midterm Examinations
message: Midterm examinations begin next week. Study schedules and exam locations posted on bulletin board.

title: Severe Weather Alert
message: School will close early today due to severe weather warning. Buses departing at 1:30 PM.

title: Grade System Maintenance
message: Gradebook system will be offline for maintenance tonight from 11 PM to 3 AM.

title: Allergy Alert
message: Student STU009 has severe nut allergies. EpiPen available in nurse's office and classroom emergency kit.

title: Missing Assignment
message: Student STU014 has not submitted Character Development Essay. Extension deadline: October 20.
